ygData.subject: Re: Avanguardia de Velorian activity on Saturday
ygData.msgSnippet: Hey Sereph Sorry, couldn t make it. Got your mail at 1am. Been working on my Quake Clan webpage, haven t been EQing for a while. Kah Mun Aka Avengeline
ygData.messageBody:
Hey Sereph

Sorry, couldn't make it. Got your mail at 1am. Been working on my Quake Clan
webpage, haven't been EQing for a while.

Kah Mun
Aka Avengeline

Sereph wrote:

> From: Sereph <garford@...>
>
> Time: 20 00 CST, 9th of October Saturday
> Server: Innoruuk
> Event: Guild meeting + farewell party for Trifrost
> Meeting place: South Karana Plains, at the centaur village
>
> Note that ALL on Inno should attend. We would have a meeting to discuss
> some of the crap we have never get to agree on (guild requirements, SOS
> calls, member position blah blah blah).
>
> Please don't give me the pathetic excuse of "I want to level so I cannot
> attend" I take that as a clear sign of munchkinism, and I don't tolerate
> that.
>
> Fesse Estasis
>
> > Singapore Everquest Players List
